rationale: Ensure raise strategy aligns with Divine Values before capital planning proceeds
Legal documents must pass moral review to ensure no deception or exploitation
Deal terms must pass all four Sacred Gates to preserve sovereignty and consent
Entity design must not create dependency structures or compromise autonomy
Compliance pathway must align with Sacred Laws especially Divine Order and Boundaries
Financial projections must meet transparency and reciprocity ethical standards
Investor outreach must ensure informed consent and avoid coercive sales tactics
Offering documents must never deceive and must present material facts with full transparency
Brand identity and voice must reflect Divine Values and pass council alignment review
Marketing compliance tied to Sacred Laws of Integrity and Truth
Investor presentations must truthfully represent value without exploitation
Campaign messaging must meet ethical standards for consent and transparency
All published content must pass Sacred Gates before distribution
Growth plans must align with Divine Values and not sacrifice principle for scale
Product brand voice needs council review for cultural sensitivity and reverence
Paid advertising must meet ethical standards and never exploit audience vulnerability
Partnership structures require informed consent and sovereignty preservation for all parties
Sales language must never deceive or coerce and must honor free will of prospects
Closing processes must preserve buyer sovereignty and avoid manufactured urgency
Campaign launch is a major milestone requiring full Sacred Gates passage
